sentences.en: I just don't want you to chastise yourself.
sentences.cn: 我只是不想让你责罚你自己。

sentences.en: Should I applaud my husband or chastise him?
sentences.cn: 我是该称赞还是责罚我的丈夫呢？

sentences.en: Girouard also used this opportunity to chastise the enterprise computing world.
sentences.cn: 吉鲁阿尔还利用这次机会批判了现有的企业级计算市场。
